item.description:
This social event will not only be a great time, but will also benefit the Beebe Library’s book fund and civic projects of the Chamber of Commerce.

This year's event will include:

Flower Show
Wakefield’s own Flower Show, featuring spectacular and fragrant arrangements created especially for Blossoms by local professionals, garden clubs and amateurs.

Wine and Beer Tasting
Wine & Beer Tastings in the Red and Gold Rooms on the Main Floor from 7:00 -10:00 pm

Cash Bars
Three Cash Bars located throughout the library serving a selection of wine & beer or spirits from 7:00 -10:45 pm

Food and Beverages
Sumptuous Hors d’oeuvres and Desserts, provided by Wakefield restaurants.

Silent Auction
Bidding on silent auction items, including fine food, sports tickets, vacation getaways, clothing and a variety of accessories, political memorabilia and more. The auction will be online beginning April 2nd and will conclude on Saturday night.

Tickets

Tickets for Saturday evening can be purchased in person at the Beebe Library Reference Desk or online for $30. A limited number of tickets may be available at the door for $40. Must be 21 years of age or older to attend.

Website - http://www.wakefieldlibrary.org/library-news/blossoms-2012/
item.name: Blossoms at the Beebe - Wakefield Library Event!
